select distinct(uuid) from ermas_account where
(over_due_days<(DATEDIFF(now(),loan_due_date))-1 AND over_due_amt>0.00) OR over_due_amt<0.00 OR (over_due_amt=0.00 AND (OVER_DUE_PRINCIPAL>0.00 OR OVERDUE_MANAGEFEE>0.00))
order by uuid asc
select a.cust_no from ermas_case_main a left join ermas_contact b on a.cust_no=b.cust_no where b.cust_no is null and a.collect_flag='I'
select CUST_NO from ermas_case_main where COLLECT_FLAG='I' and length(cust_no)>0
